mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ARTICLE(ARTICLE_ID, ARTICLE_TITLE, ARTICLE_CONTENT, ARTICLE_CONTENT_HTML, ARTICLE_ORIGIN_USER_ID, ARTICLE_SECURITY, TYPE_ID, ARTICLE_STATUS, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, IS_DELETE) VALUES (#{ARTICLE_ID},#{ARTICLE_TITLE},#{ARTICLE_CONTENT},#{ARTICLE_CONTENT_HTML},#{ARTICLE_ORIGIN_USER_ID},#{ARTICLE_SECURITY},#{TYPE_ID},#{ARTICLE_STATUS},#{CREATE_DATE},#{UPDATE_DATE},#{IS_DELETE})
mapper.update: update ARTICLE SET ARTICLE_STATUS=#{articleStatus} where ARTICLE_ID=#{articleId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM ARTICLE A WHERE 1=1 and A.ARTICLE_TITLE LIKE concat('%',#{articleName},'%') and (A.ARTICLE_STATUS='1' OR A.ARTICLE_STATUS='3') and A.IS_DELETE = '2' ORDER BY A.CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT U.* FROM USER U WHERE 1=1
and U.USER_ID = #{authorId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ARTICLE_LIKE(ARTICLE_LIKE_ID, USER_ID, ARTICLE_ID, CREATE_DATE, IS_DELETE) VALUES (#{articleLikeId},#{userId},#{articleId},#{createDate},#{isDelete})
INSERT INTO ARTICLE_COLLECT(ARTICLE_COLLECT_ID, USER_ID, ARTICLE_ID, CREATE_DATE, IS_DELETE) VALUES (#{articleCollectId},#{userId},#{articleId},#{createDate},#{isDelete})
mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM ARTICLE_COLLECT AC,ARTICLE A WHERE 1=1 AND AC.USER_ID =#{userId} AND A.ARTICLE_ID = AC.ARTICLE_ID AND AC.IS_DELETE = '2'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACTIVITY(ACTIVITY_ID, USER_ID, ACTIVITY_STATUS, ARITCLE_ID, AUTHOR_ID, CREATE_DATE, BUSINESS_ID) VALUES (#{activityId},#{userId},#{activityStatus},#{articleId},#{authorId},#{createDate},#{businessId})
mapper.select: SELECT AL.*,U.USER_NAME FROM ARTICLE_LIKE AL,USER U WHERE 1=1 AND AL.ARTICLE_LIKE_ID = #{likeId} AND AL.USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND AL.IS_DELETE = '2'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ARTICLE A WHERE 1=1 AND A.IS_DELETE = '2'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ARTICLE_COLLECT AC WHERE 1=1 AND AC.IS_DELETE = '2'
